name: ProductMind
description:
A platform that converts and organizes files from Google Drive, Notion, and other sources into a comprehensive, searchable knowledge base for Trilogy's M&A due diligence process.

Leverages AI-powered conversion tools (Claude, OpenAI GPT-4) to transform various file types into searchable Markdown format. Integrates with AWS Bedrock to provide AI-powered question answering over the aggregated knowledge base.

Built on AWS serverless architecture using Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, and Step Functions. Features automated file conversion pipelines, metadata extraction, and centralized knowledge management for analyzing acquired company codebases and documentation.
